TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit NamedPipeTransportBindingElement extends System.ServiceModel.Channels.ConnectionOrientedTransportBindingElement

summary.span: 表示命名管道传输的绑定元素。

span.span: Represents the binding element for the named pipe transport.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此传输使用 "：//" 形式的 Uri `net.pipe` `hostname` / `path` 。This transport uses URIs of the form "`net.pipe`://`hostname`/`path`". 其他 URI 组件是可选的。Other URI components are optional. 类是创建实现命名管道传输协议的自定义绑定的起始点。The class is the starting point for creating a custom binding that implements the named pipes transport protocol. 此传输用于计算机上的 WCF 通信。This transport is used for on-machine WCF communication. WCF 服务模型使用此类创建实现和接口的工厂对象 。The WCF service model uses this class to create factory objects that implement the and interfaces. 之后，这些工厂对象创建并接受使用命名管道协议传输 SOAP 消息的通道。These factory objects then create and accept the channels that transmit SOAP messages using the named pipes protocol. 您通过设置此类的属性配置此类创建的工厂，例如 。You configure the factories that this class creates by setting its properties, such as: . 还可以设置基类 上的属性，例如：、 和 。You can also set properties on the base class, , such as: , , and . 有关完整的属性列表，请参见 。For a complete list of properties, see . 最后，您还可以设置 的基类（即 ）上的属性，例如 。Finally, you can set properties on the base class of , which is , such as . 有关完整的属性列表，请参见 。For a complete list of properties, see . ## Examples 此示例演示如何使用此类：This example shows how to use this class: [!code-csharp[S_UENamedPipeTransportBindingElement#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uenamedpipetransportbindingelement/cs/program.cs#0)] [!code-vb[S_UENamedPipeTransportBindingElement#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uenamedpipetransportbindingelement/vb/module1.vb#0)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法是用于克隆绑定元素的复制构造函数，并且是公开的，因此派生类可以实现 。This method is a copy constructor used to clone the binding element, and is exposed so that derived classes can implement . ## Examples 此示例演示如何初始化该类的新实例：This example shows how to initialize a new instance of the class: [!code-csharp[S_UENamedPipeTransportBindingElement#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uenamedpipetransportbindingelement/cs/program.cs#2)] [!code-vb[S_UENamedPipeTransportBindingElement#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uenamedpipetransportbindingelement/vb/module1.vb#2)]

summary.span: 创建指定类型的可用于创建通道的通道工厂。

span.span: Creates a channel factory of the specified type that can be used to create channels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可用于创建指定类型的通道工厂，以基于传输绑定元素的配置发送消息。This method can be used to create a channel factory of the specified type for sending messages based on the configuration of the transport binding element. ## Examples 此示例演示如何创建指定类型的可用于创建通道的通道工厂：This example shows how to create a channel factory of the specified type that can be used to create channels: [!code-csharp[S_UENamedPipeTransportBindingElement#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uenamedpipetransportbindingelement/cs/program.cs#6)] [!code-vb[S_UENamedPipeTransportBindingElement#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uenamedpipetransportbindingelement/vb/module1.vb#6)]
